Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.ReverseAssociationSlot

public interface ReverseAssociationSlot
extends AssociationSlot
A ReverseAssociationSlot is used when your partner's table has a foreign-key back to your table's primary key. A ReverseAssociationSlot is specified in terms of a partner and a ForwardAssociationSlot of that partner. Forward and Reverse associations are complementary:

By default a ReverseAssociation is one-to-many, but if you know the cardinality is restricted to one-to-one you can setup the slot to know that as well. In this case the slot will return either the single object or 'null' instead of a collection of objects.

Method Index

isOneToOne()
Is this reverse association a one-to-one correspondence? This also means that the return object is expected to be a single object or null
setupIsOneToOne()
Make this association a one-to-one correspondence instead of a one-to-many.

Methods

setupIsOneToOne 
 public abstract void setupIsOneToOne()
Make this association a one-to-one correspondence instead of a one-to-many.

isOneToOne 
 public abstract boolean isOneToOne()
Is this reverse association a one-to-one correspondence? This also means that the return object is expected to be a single object or null
